About Me

I am a PhD student within the European Industrial Doctorate SECENTIS, in collaboration between the University of Trento , the Security & Trust research unit at ( S&T ) in FBK, and SAP Labs France.

My research interest focuses on Privacy aspects in Access Control Systems. ( you can check my full CV just [HERE] ).

I am also interested in the following research fields

  • Data management and security
  • Utility-aware Anonymization
  • Privacy In Big Data
  • User-Centric and Usable Privacy
  • Risk and Trust Management

I will be posting blog articals soon. It will most probably be about one of the following topics

Access and Usage Control, Data management and security, Utility-aware Anonymization, Privacy In Big Data, User-Centric and Usable Privacy, Risk and Trust Management,

Hope you will enjoy it :)

Publications

Papers in international conferances and journals

[1] A. Armando, M. Bezzi, F. Di Cerbo, and N. Metoui. Balancing trust and risk in access control . In C&TC 2015: On the Move to Meaningful Internet Systems: OTM 2015 Conferences , pages 660–676. Springer International Publishing, 2015.

[2] A. Armando, M. Bezzi, N. Metoui, and A. Sabetta. Risk-based privacy-aware information disclosure . International Journal of Secure Software Engineering , 6(2):70–89, Apr. 2015.

[3] A. Armando, M. Bezzi, N. Metoui and A. Sabetta. Risk-aware information disclosure. QASA 2014 3rd International Workshop on Quantitative Aspects in Security Assurance Affiliated workshop with ESORICS : European Symposium on Research in Computer Security . In Lecture Notes in Computer Science (LNCS), volume 8872, 2014.
